page.title: 13Cullyhanna Superstitions (1)
page.content: There are many superstitions in our area and some people still believe in them today. For instance,one should not walk under a ladder as it is considered unlucky and one should say "God Bless You"to anyone who sneezes. Do not look through the window at a new moon and never put up an umbrella in the house as it brings bad luck.If you kill a spider,it will rain and if a spider runs up your arm you will become rich.One magpie brings bad luck - two are said to be lucky.If the oak is in leaf before the ash,it will only rain a little during the summer,but if the ash is before the oak,then we are to get a soak!Two spoons in a cup is the sign of a wedding in the family and two members of the family should not get wed in the one year.It is generally believed,"Happy is the bride that the sun shines on."
